characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Add 1 to the leadership characteristicof ASPECT WARRIORS with this attribute. In addition, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for shuriken weapons used by units with this attribute. A shuriken weapon is any weapon profile whose name includes the word "shuriken" (e.g. shuriken pistol, Avenger shuriken catapult etc.) Kurnous' Bow, the Blazing Star of Vaul, and Scorpion's Claw are also shuriken weapons.
